articles.title: US secures key military deal with the Philippines to counter Beijing’s growing regional influence - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: The Philippines signed an agreement with the United States on Thursday that will allow American soldiers free access to four of its new military bases at a time of growing unease in the Indo-Pacific region over China's burgeoning influence.
